name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DPRK style caption for Youtube caption

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make Youtube caption look like DPRK style

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make Youtube caption look like DPRK style.

If you want to watch Korean music on Youtube like you watch on KCTV, you can include this extension!

And, this extension would change the name of the leader to bold(only Korean text).
